meanings.sent1: The angulated shape of the building made it stand out in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The artist used angulated lines to create a modern and edgy design.
meanings.sent3: The angulated puzzle pieces were challenging to fit together.
meanings.sent4: Her angulated haircut gave her a unique and stylish look.
meanings.sent5: The angulated shadows cast by the streetlights created a mysterious atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: The angulated edges of the table were sharp and dangerous.
meanings.sent2: The angulated pattern on the rug added a geometric flair to the room.
meanings.sent3: The angulated cake slices made the dessert look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The angulated rocks along the shore created a picturesque scene.
meanings.sent5: The angulated branches of the tree intertwined to form a natural canopy.

meanings.definition: To make angular or form angles
meanings.sent1: He angulated the metal rod to fit it into the frame.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter angulated the pieces of wood to create a sturdy structure.
meanings.sent3: She angulated the paper airplane to make it fly farther.
meanings.sent4: The gymnast angulated her body to execute a perfect handstand.
meanings.sent5: The dancer angulated her arms gracefully during the performance.
